      • setItemCoolDown

        void setItemCoolDown(org.bukkit.Material itemType,
                     int cd)
        To set a item cool down to player

        Cool down time unit is tick (20 ticks = 1 second)

        Parameters:
        itemType - item
        cd - cool down

                   int fadeIn,
                   int stay,
                   int fadeOut)
        To send actionbar to player

        Time unit is tick (20 ticks = 1 second)

        Parameters:
        gText - message
        fadeIn - fadeIn time default is 10
        stay - stay time default is 70
        fadeOut - fadeOut time default is 20

      • sendTitleWithSubTitle

        void sendTitleWithSubTitle(GText title,
                           GText subTitle,
                           int fadeIn,
                           int stay,
                           int fadeOut)
        To send title with sub title

        Title and sub title use same time

        Time unit is tick (20 ticks = 1 second)

        Parameters:
        title - title message
        subTitle - sub title message
        fadeIn - fadeIn time default is 10
        stay - stay time default is 70
        fadeOut - fadeOut time default is 20

      • sendTitleWithSubTitle

        void sendTitleWithSubTitle(GText title,
                           int titleFadeIn,
                           int titleStay,
                           int titleFadeOut,
                           GText subTitle,
                           int subTitleFadeIn,
                           int subTitleStay,
                           int subTitleFadeOut)
        To send title with sub title

        Title and sub title use different time

        Time unit is tick (20 ticks = 1 second)

        Parameters:
        title - title message
        titleFadeIn - title fadeIn time default is 10
        titleStay - title stay time default is 70
        titleFadeOut - title fadeOut time default is 20
        subTitle - sub title message
        subTitleFadeIn - sub title fadeIn time default is 10
        subTitleStay - sub title stay time default is 70
        subTitleFadeOut - sub title fadeOut time default is 20
